code:
module TopModule (
    input logic cpu_overheated,
    output logic shut_off_computer,
    input logic arrived,
    input logic gas_tank_empty,
    output logic keep_driving
);

    always @(*) begin
        shut_off_computer = cpu_overheated ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
    end

    always @(*) begin
        keep_driving = ~arrived & ~gas_tank_empty;
    end

endmodule
